price: We have not heard of this in the last religion[5]. This is nothing but a fabrication.
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
footnotes: [5] It refers to Christianity or pagan Arab beliefs.
